home.title: NUniversity - Interactive Learning Platform
home.description: Master technology, engineering, and sciences through interactive courses, coding tools, and educational games. Start your learning journey today.

about.title: About Us - Your Company Name
about.description: Learn about our mission, values, and the team behind our success

hero.title: About Us
hero.description: Nuniversity is a non-profit educational initiative dedicated to transforming lives through accessible, high-quality learning opportunities for all.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To make transformational education universally accessible by providing practical and impactful knowledge that empowers individuals and strengthens communities worldwide.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: To create a world where everyone, regardless of background or circumstance, has the opportunity to learn, grow, and contribute to a more equitable and sustainable future.

items.title: Equity
items.description: We believe that education is a fundamental right and should be accessible to everyone.

items.title: Empowerment
items.description: We inspire people to reach their full potential through knowledge and learning.

items.title: Collaboration
items.description: We build bridges across communities, cultures, and disciplines to drive shared progress.

items.title: Integrity
items.description: We act with honesty, transparency, and respect in all that we do.

items.title: Innovation
items.description: We embrace creativity and technology to expand the reach and impact of education.

team.title: Meet Our Team
team.description: Our global team of educators, technologists, and visionaries is passionate about making high-quality education accessible to all.

members.name: Leandro Alves
members.bio: Tech and data leader with over 8 years of experience building scalable and impactful digital solutions.

hero.title: Learn, Code, and
hero.subtitle: Master technology, engineering, and sciences through interactive courses, hands-on coding tools, and educational games designed for modern learners.

features.title: Everything You Need to
features.subtitle: Our platform combines the best of interactive learning, practical tools, and community support to create an unparalleled educational experience.

courses.title: Interactive Courses
courses.description: Comprehensive courses in technology, engineering, and sciences with hands-on projects and real-world applications.

coding.title: Coding Tools
coding.description: Built-in code editors, compilers, and interactive environments to practice programming in multiple languages.

study.title: Study Tools
study.description: Advanced calculators, formula references, and interactive tools to support your learning journey.

games.title: Educational Games
games.description: Gamified learning experiences that make complex concepts fun and engaging to master.

video.title: Video Integration
video.description: Seamless YouTube integration for video lectures and tutorials embedded directly in courses.

community.title: Community Driven
community.description: Join a community of learners and educators sharing knowledge and collaborating on projects.

contact.title: Let's
contact.subtitle: Ready to transform the world through the democratization of education? Let's collaborate and drive community development.

info.heading: Get in Touch
info.description: We’re open to discussing new opportunities, projects, and ways to use technology to transform the world by empowering people with impactful knowledge.

footer.description: Empowering learners worldwide with interactive courses, coding tools, and educational games. Master technology, engineering, and sciences through hands-on experience.

promptBuilder.title: LLM Prompt Builder
promptBuilder.subtitle: Create structured, effective prompts for Large Language Models

role.label: Agent Role
role.placeholder: e.g., an expert Python developer, a creative writer

objective.label: Objective
objective.placeholder: What do you want the AI to do?

constraints.label: Constraints
constraints.placeholder: e.g., Keep it under 500 words, avoid jargon

outputFormat.label: Output Format
outputFormat.placeholder: e.g., JSON, bullet points, step-by-step guide

emptyState.line1: Fill in the form and click "Generate Prompt"
emptyState.line2: to see your structured prompt here

tip.label: Tip
tip.text: Copy this prompt and paste it into your favorite LLM (ChatGPT, Claude, Gemini, etc.) for best results.

promptTemplate.closingText: Please provide a comprehensive response following the guidelines above.

tip1.title: Be Specific
tip1.text: Clearly define what you want. The more specific your objective, the better the results.

tip2.title: Provide Context
tip2.text: Background information helps the AI understand your needs and generate more relevant responses.

tip3.title: Use Examples
tip3.text: Show examples of the desired output format to guide the AI's response structure.
